imdb.plot outline: Vivacious Veronica vi' her guest into their purpose, helping them transition into a lifestyle change or intervention. Vivacious Veronica uses her intuitive gift of insight to foretell her guest of things to come in the near future. She laughs with her guest, cries with her guest and chastises her guest all while leading them on a path of clarity.
imdb.title: Vivacious Veronica
plot: _Vivacious Veronica_ (qv) vi' her guest into their purpose, helping them transition into a lifestyle change or intervention. _Vivacious Veronica_ (qv) uses her intuitive gift of insight to foretell her guest of things to come in the near future. She laughs with her guest, cries with her guest and chastises her guest all while leading them on a path of clarity.::Veronica J Woodard
